channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI adoption at scale is hard. Just look at India, which processes about 20 billion transactions every month
item.description: The most valuable AI systems will not look dramatic. They will look ordinary. They will fade into routine decisions and familiar processes.

item.title: Trump warns U.S. will ‘knock the hell out of’ Iran’s nuclear capabilities if it’s rebuilding them amid Israeli concerns about long-range missiles
item.description: "We'll knock them down. We'll knock the hell out of them. But hopefully that’s not happening.”

item.title: Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq all close lower, as silver and gold pull back sharply
European stock market hits new record high
Why Singapore is the only Southeast Asian country in Pax Silica, the U.S.’s new AI ‘inner circle’
item.description: Singapore is “precisely the kind of ‘trusted node’ the U.S. is seeking to anchor AI-era supply chains,” says Ruben Durante, a professor at Singapore's...

item.title: Beyoncé just became a billionaire. Here’s how she did it.
Should I name my daughter as beneficiary or add her name to my accounts?
Silicon Valley summit offers rare insight into humanoid robots—and China is the clear winner
item.description: China is leading in part due to government incentives for component production and robot adoption and a mandate last year “to have a humanoid ecosyste...

item.title: Trump says he’ll announce new Fed chair in January, renews attacks on Powell
Trump says he still might fire Powell as Fed chair pick looms
item.description: Trump added the Powell should resign and that he’d “love to fire him.”
